page.title: 09THE COPPER MINE PUBLIC HOUSE
page.content: The beer comes from Boddingtons Brewery in Manchester. There are about 150 customers every weekday and 300 on a weekend day. The most popular drink is bitter at 72p a pint, children's favourite drink is Coca Cola. People usually stay for about 1-1.5 hours. Restocking is done on a Tuesday, the dray wagon brings 7 barrels. Opening times are 11.00am-3.00pm and 5.30pm-10.30pm(11.00pm on Friday and Saturday). Food is varied, there is a salad bar, a steak menu and snacks,the 13 staff are all part-time. The pub belongs to Bolesworth Estate, the licencee has had 5 other pubs, he came here at Easter 1985 and has changed the inside and outside completely, the new name was chosen because of the old copper mine down the road, decorations are mining relics and photographs.
